channel.title: Solanum arcanum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Solanum arcanum on funPlantGenes

item.title: Mi-9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sarc_034200 Gene Symbol: Mi-9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum arcanum Functional Description: we cloned, confirmed and applied the heat-stable RKN-resistance gene Mi-9, which is of great significance to tomato breeding for nematode resistance.

item.title: ShCYP71D184
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ShCYP71D184 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum arcanum Functional Description: Using a combination of transcriptomics and genetics, we identified a gene coding for a cytochrome P450 oxygenase, ShCYP71D184, that is highly expressed in trichomes and co-segregates with the presence of the zingiberene derivatives.
